channel.title: 6m on New blog of OK1CDJ
channel.description: Recent content in 6m on New blog of OK1CDJ

item.title: November 2025 DX Highlights
item.description: November Logbook Analysis: Hunting DXpeditions and 6m Openings The first three weeks of November 2025 were exceptionally active, featuring numerous h DXpeditions, especially on the low bands (60m) and the Magic Band (6 meters).

item.title: October 2025 DX Highlights
item.description: October 2025 Logbook Analysis: Rare DX and Band Activity October 2025 delivered an outstanding month of radio propagation, allowing me (SV0SYH, KN10LO) to log some nice DXs, particularly spanning the vast Pacific Ocean and securing contacts with rare entities in Africa and the Caribbean.
